OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind , multicenter study . Patients stratify tumor type ( primary v metastatic ) , treatment ( radiotherapy v radiotherapy chemotherapy ) , Karnofsky performance status ( 70 % 80 % vs 90 % 100 % ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . All patient undergo radiotherapy week 1-4 . - Arm I : Patients receive oral d-methylphenidate twice daily week 1-12 . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo twice daily week 1-12 . In arm , quality life assess baseline , end radiotherapy , 4 , 8 , 12 week radiotherapy . Patients follow 4 week .
